Articles.Content: All Stock, No Mods, No Hyper Editing & Three Launches so far. ![p>
mk9? Don't tell me you've built 9 eve stations...
Most eve missions result in a station, the mothership is a station or probe if not deorbited or landed on gilly.

> 
> mk9? Don't tell me you've built 9 eve stations...

The lander being used is an MK1 I used 9 for the core of the station so i decided to name it MK-9
